Lack enough support: The claim made by ABP News about Kangana joining BJP during Bihar elections lacks enough support as no other media organization has reported on it.
Contradict fact: The claim about schools and colleges not opening this year contradicts the fact that the Ministry of Health has allowed them to reopen with limitations.
Exaggerate: The claim about schools and colleges not opening this year exaggerates the situation by stating that they may not open until 2021, whereas the Ministry of Health has already allowed them to reopen.
Problematic assumption: The claim about Kangana joining BJP is based on a morphed image and lacks evidence, making it a problematic assumption.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting morphed images as genuine ABP News screenshots, which raises doubts about the credibility of the claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim about schools and colleges not opening this year ignores the alternative explanation provided by the Ministry of Health, which allows them to reopen with certain limitations.
